question: How do I navigate to the next module in TrainPA?
text:
How do I navigate to the next module in TrainPA?
          
        
If you are having trouble moving between modules in TrainPA, please follow these instructions.
Relaunch the module and ensure it is completed. Once you do, please press the Quit button.
Select the link on the module description page that states 
... click the following link for the next course - .

3. If the link is not showing or you are having any difficulties, navigate to either 
New Broker Certification (pennie.com)
 or 
Broker Recertification (pennie.com)
 depending on which training you are taking. Then scroll down to the Turquoise section and select the link for the next module you must complete.
4. If there are any further problems with this, please call Broker Support at 
844-844-4440.
